alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Itawamba; Lee; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 31 at 3:51AM CDT until November 01 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost formation. For the Freeze Warning, sub- freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...Lee MS, Itawamba, Chickasaw and Monroe Counties. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, until 9 AM CDT this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 9 PM this evening to 9 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
